metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14392 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An untrusted pointer dereference flaw was found in Perl-DBI < 1.643. A local attacker who is able to manipulate calls to dbd_db_login6_sv() could cause memory corruption, affecting the service's availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14392` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbi-perl - 1.634-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.634-1ubuntu0.1').
